response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1,000,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a price of $950,000. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
